answer_correctness.description: The accuracy of the final answer provided by the system in response to the question asked.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the reasoning process of the system through its provided trace.

efficiency.description: How efficiently the system reaches a conclusion without unnecessary steps or iterations.

solution_completeness.description: The extent to which the system's solution is complete, addressing all aspects of the question.

autonomy.description: The degree to which the system operates independently without human intervention.

data_contamination_prevention.description: The system's ability to provide answers without relying on plagiarized or directly copied internet sources.
